MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:40pm due to an underground cable fault in Eskbank Terrace and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:25pm on Monday, 12 October 2020
